nodes.bodyText: Could this be consolidated with the previous/first if block?
if we are closing the modeless here, is there a need to fetch the runtime args? Can we just do a return; after?

So we are closing the pipeline config modeless from here because we only want one to be open (because they are using a component that uses same store). The runtime arguments are the run level arguments. So this will make sure we only close the pipeline config modeless when we open runtime arguments at runlevel.
